Posts.Content: Oct 8, 2007 02:35PM Lin5 wrote: I also was recently diagnosed with mets.After 5 years in remission. Started Taxotere along with Herceptin. The thought of going through with all this again has made me like a zombie on some days. I thought I had this beat 5 years ago. Why I ask has it come back in such a horrible way? My mind races day to day " Will I survive this time?" Thanks to Xanax it eases my mind during the day and gives me somewhat a good night sleep. But then a new day begins. I'm so afraid I will not make it. Does anyone have these horrifying lows? Prayers for all going through it, Linda
Posts.Title: Metastatic at presentation Kelolo Annie4
